title: New: Bibio – À tout à l’heure
body:
After the disappointment that was _Mind Bokeh_, **Bibio** is set to release his 7th studio record in the form of _Silver Wilkinson_.

Now distinctly a pop musician, he may have lost some of the landscape elements of his music that made early albums like **FI** so spellbinding, despite this what’s important to remember is **Bibio** sure can knock out a belta pop tune; _À tout à l’heure_ is no exception.

_Silver Wilkinson_ with release via **warp** on 14 May.
